definition: a short stretch of railroad track used to store rolling stock or enable trains on the same line to pass
details:
noun
- a short stretch of railroad track used to store rolling stock or enable trains on the same line to pass
= example: a short stretch of railroad track used to store rolling stock or enable trains on the same line to pass
= synonyms: turnout
- a material applied to the outside of a building to make it weatherproof, made of wood, aluminum, or other materials
= example: a material applied to the outside of a building to make it weatherproof, made of wood, aluminum, or other materials
